definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: natron, or carbonate of soda, a mineral alkali (NH = BH; Aram. [[נִתְרָא]], netro0; cf. Gk. ni/tron, li/tron, Lat. nitrum (v. Lexx.));—[[אִם־תְּכַבְּסִי בַּנֶּתֶר]] Je 2:22 though thou wash thyself with natron (fig.; ‖[[בּׂרִית]]; on use of ‘ nitrum ’ for handwashing among Greeks v. Meineke:Fragm. Comicorum ii. 638); [[חׂמֶץ עַל־נׇ֑תֶר]] Pr 25:20 (fig. of the incompatible).
